A

addBlock(int) - Method in class Model.Memory
Adds a new block to the memory if there is space (memory is not full).

C

Cache - Class in Model
The Cache class represents a cache system with multiple sets.

Constructor for the Cache class.
CacheSet - Class in Model
The CacheSet class represents a set within a cache, containing multiple blocks.

CacheSimulator - Class in Controller
The CacheSimulator class represents a terminal-based cache simulation program.

Constructor for the CacheSimulator class.
calcAvgMAT() - Method in class Model.Cache
Calculates the average Memory Access Time (MAT) based on hit rate and miss rate.
calcMissPenalty() - Method in class Model.Cache
Calculates the miss penalty for cache misses (NLT).
calcTotalMAT() - Method in class Model.Cache
Calculates the total Memory Access Time (MAT) based on cache hits and misses.

I

isFull() - Method in class Model.CacheSet

R

Reads data from the cache for the specified memory address.

T

toCache(Cache, int) - Method in class Model.Memory
Transfers data from the memory to the cache if the data is not already present in the cache.
